column4: What's wrong with rhythmbox? It doesn't play any music files, it keeps skipping. Nothing wrong's with the files, and it's pointed to the right folder. I can play each file through terminal.. what gives...................
you need codecs
no i don't... it was just fine and one day it decided to skip everysong.
if i needed codecs then mplayer wouldn't play it either.
run rhythmbox in the console and see what error it gives
no errors..
do those files exists? in the right directory? can you play them with Movie Player (totem)?
yeah man I am playing them right now with mplayer, the work just fine,
check the correct path of the files in the playlist
all the files are in one folder and that folder has been imported.
can you play it with Movie Player?
yeah, i'm using the mplayer in terminal... anything in GUI can't play the files.. even the gui version of mplayer can't play.
don't understand why all of a sudden it can't paly.
define "can't play"
try log out and log in back
I hit play... it quickly starts skipping each file after an attempt to play them.. it makes that little error icon next to each file. I try to go into the errors tab but doesn't say what's up...
weird. ;\ try to ask in the forum
i tried banshee same problem...
tried relogging same problem.
did you try with vlc?
nope not yet... but i don't understand, it should work in rhythmbox.. i used it since i can remember... all of a sudden it starts doing this.
vlc can play them... what gives?
codecs problem probably. if you open a mp3 file with Movie Player, it should ask you to install codecs
